name: Black Peace Sign Scarf
description:
Peace Sign Colorful Viscose Scarf

Keep the that Spring chill out and the fashion in with Peace Colorful Viscose collection scarves. They come in all the great, vibrant Spring colors so you can bloom just like the flowers. Show your love and peace with this stylish scarf all year around.

 Features:

    * 100% Viscose, Dry Clean or Handwash

       
    * 66" L x 12" W
    * Excellent stretch ability and recovery
    * Perfect for casual occasions

name: Pink with Gold Coins Belly Dance Hip Scarf
description:
Imported Hot Pink Hip Scarf laced with gold coins and intricate beading.

3 rows of total 158 Gold coins, Approx. 60 - 63'' Long, 12" Wide
